name: DisplayPerformancePreference
shortdesc: Default display performance settings for the application.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the DisplayPerformancePreference (a Application).

property.name: defaultDisplaySettings
property.shortdesc: Object-level default display performance settings. Note: The settings do not apply to graphics that are already placed in the document.

property.name: ignoreLocalSettings
property.shortdesc: If true, ignores object-level default display performance settings and uses the application-level default display settings; also prevents setting object-level settings.

property.name: persistLocalSettings
property.shortdesc: If true, sets application-level preferences to preserve object-level display settings.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the DisplayPerformancePreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
